name: Disconnected Yet Connected
description:
What does it mean to connect? Can you be truly connected with someone if you don't know what they're thinking? And would you be truly connected if you did ? What if those connections are broken ? What if you can't restore them anymore?  Can you imagine the confusion and chaos that would cause? 

Disconnected Yet Connected is a game that asks all these questions-and never proceeds to answer them. Because I'm a terrible writer and It's impossible to answer those questions in a 10 minute long game anyway.

But yes, I did have fun making it.

Note: You can speed up most dialogue by pressing Z. It's a huge help if you want to replay the game for another ending.
